message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Could you consider that?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $10000. How about we meet in the middle at $14000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $12000?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $12000. How about we meet at $13000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $12500?
I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make a decent profit. How about we meet at $13250?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. How about we meet at $12750?
